title._content: [Unidentified soldiers of 5th Ohio Cavalry Company with horses and mountain howitzer]  (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldiers of 5th Ohio Cavalry Company with horses and mountain howitzer] [1861] 1 photograph : half-plate tintype ; 17.3 x 20.6 cm (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
